title: Innovation services for enhancing SME innovation management capacities in Madrid Region
objective: ìIInnovation services for enhancing SME innovation management capacities in Madrid Region- INNMADRIMASD 3î is a proposal addressing the topic ëEnhancing SME innovation capacity by providing better innovation support ìunder Horizon 2020. INNMADRIMASD 3 will provide innovation services to SMEs in Madrid through the Enterprise Europe Network as a suitable structure to provide in depth support services to SMEs in the area of innovation management. Furthermore, beneficiaries of the SME Instrument under Horizon 2020 will be entitled to receive specific targeted support from the Enterprise Europe Network to support coaching assignments addressing specific innovation weaknesses for Madrid based SMEs.
participants: CONFEDERACION EMPRESARIAL DE MADRID;ASOCIACION DE EMPRESARIOS DEL COMERCIO E INDUSTRIA DEL METAL DE MADRID;CAMARA OFICIAL DE COMERCIO E INDUSTRIA DE MADRID;AGENCIA ESTATAL CONSEJO SUPERIOR DEINVESTIGACIONES CIENTIFICAS;MADRID NETWORK ASOCIACION;FUNDACION PARQUE CIENTIFICO DE MADRID-FPCM;ASOCIACION DE EMPRESARIOS DEL HENARES
